name: FileInfo
author: TheHive-Project
description: Parse files in several formats such as OLE and OpenXML to detect VBA macros, extract their source code, generate useful information on PE, PDF files...

configurationItems.name: manalyze_enable
configurationItems.description: Wether to enable manalyze submodule or not.

configurationItems.name: manalyze_enable_binary
configurationItems.description: Use local binary to run Manalyze. Need to compile it before!

configurationItems.name: manalyze_binary_path
configurationItems.description: Path to the Manalyze binary that was compiled before
